title: Ticket #3595: $RANDOM_CHOICE mishandles $MACROS?
description:
>        The problem I have seen on my tries is that
>
> COLLECTOR_HOST = $RANDOM_CHOICE(condor-cm:10002,condor-cm:10003,condor-cm:10004)
>
>        could not be written as
>
> CONDOR_HOST = condor-cm
>
> COLLECTOR_HOST = $RANDOM_CHOICE($(CONDOR_HOST):10002,$(CONDOR_HOST):10003,$(CONDOR_HOST):10004)
>
>        Condor parses as:
>
>        COLLECTOR_HOST = $(CONDOR_HOST:10002,condor-cm:10003,condor-cm:10004)
>
>        that is wrong!
creator: tlmiller
